channel.title: Specifications, protocols and schemas on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Specifications, protocols and schemas on open-archaeo

item.title: Archaeo-Term
item.description: Multilingual glossary designed to enhance access to archaeological data.

item.title: archvocab
item.description: The ArchVocab ontologies by Leif Isaksen

item.title: ARCSCore
item.description: ARCSCore is a metadata standard for organizing and sharing digital versions of non-digital documents created during the course of an archaeological investigation

item.title: FISH Vocabularies
item.description: A suite of terminologies developed for indexing cultural heritage.

item.title: harris-matrix-data-package
item.description: A Data Package specification for archaeological stratigraphy data following the Harris Matrix convention.

item.title: inclusions
item.description: Shortcodes to describe inclusions in ceramic bodies.

item.title: nonekXML
item.description: Exchange data format (XML) for NoNeK (Nordmitteleurop√§ische Neolithische Keramik).

item.title: NRHP_Metadata_Scheme
item.description: Metadata scheme for National Register of Historic Places, transcribed from the National Park Service NPS Bulletin 16

item.title: rppsfs
item.description: Roman Peasant Project Small Finds Ontology

item.title: tridas
item.description: TRiDaS is a universal data exchange standard for the dendrochronology community. This project contains the data standard itself as well as libraries and tools useful for reading, writing and converting dendro data files.
